question.sentence: When I went to Egypt, I'd had some Arabic lessons.
When he got home, they locked the front door.
When it started to rain, I'd closed all the windows.
When I went into the room, he switched off the radio.
When the waiter brought the bill, I'd put the money on the table.
When we sat down to watch the film, it had started.
When I opened the tin, they'd finished all the biscuits.
When she went to complain, he'd turned down the music.
When my mother married, she stopped going to work.
When she arrived at the party, he'd left.
